import React from "react"; import {useDispatch,useSelector} from 'react-redux' import { useState,useEffect } from "react"; import { userAction } from "../../action"; // components export default function CardSettings() { const[inputs,setInputs]=useState({ username:'', email:'', newpassword:'', re_enter:'', }); const profile = useSelector(state=>state.authentication.user); console.log("hello:",profile.user.id) setInputs({username:profile.user.username}) return ( <>
My account
Admin Information
); }
